<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><Highlight kind="comment">/// SMRange is implemented using a half-open range, as is the convention in C++.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><Highlight kind="comment">/// In the string &quot;abc&quot;, the range &#91;1,3) represents the substring &quot;bc&quot;, and the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><Highlight kind="comment">/// range &#91;2,2) represents an empty range between the characters &quot;b&quot; and &quot;c&quot;.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
